Uses of Class
org.xflatdb.xflat.query.XPathUpdate

  • Packages that use XPathUpdate 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat
    This package contains the public interface for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.query
    This package contains classes related to XPath-based queries.

    • Uses of XPathUpdate in org.xflatdb.xflat

      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat with parameters of type XPathUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Table.update(java.lang.Object id, XPathUpdate update)
      Applies an update to the data in a given row.
      int Table.update(XPathQuery query, XPathUpdate update)
      Applies an update to all data matching a given query.

      int ElementTable.update(XPathQuery query, XPathUpdate update)

      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.query that return XPathUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> XPathUpdate XPathUpdate.andSet(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path, java.lang.Object value)
      Adds an additional update operation that sets the values selected by the XPath expression.
      <T> XPathUpdate XPathUpdate.andUnset(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path)
      Adds an additional update operation that removes the element or attribute selected by the XPath expression.
      static <T> XPathUpdate XPathUpdate.set(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path, java.lang.Object value)
      Creates an update that sets the values selected by the XPath expression.
      static <T> XPathUpdate XPathUpdate.unset(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<T> path)
      Creates an update that removes the element or attribute selected by the XPath expression.
